function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misuse of health information by Big Tech and governments","Impact":"Violation of civil liberties and privacy","Mitigation":"Regulation and oversight of data collection and usage","Technologies":"Data encryption and anonymization","People":"General public, individuals with health information","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, data protection agencies"},{"Description":"Disproportionate impact on the poor and vulnerable","Impact":"Increased suffering due to low savings and limited access to healthcare","Mitigation":"Increased social protection, improved access to healthcare, and financial support","Technologies":"Healthcare access platforms, financial assistance systems","People":"Low-income individuals, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs"},{"Description":"Risk of capital outflows and economic damage to low-income countries","Impact":"Economic instability and damage to economies dependent on natural resource exports","Mitigation":"Economic diversification, currency stabilization measures","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, trade diversification platforms","People":"Residents of low-income countries, governments of affected nations","Owner":"International financial institutions, local governments"}]}
